creator: info@zaccaria-pinball.com
text:
The introduction on this page says:

------------------------------------------------------------------------------
There are three signals that you can send the parent: TERM, HUP, and USR1, which 
will be described in a moment.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The page then goes on to describe TERM, HUP, USR1, and WINCH. Seems like WINCH 
should be added to the list in the introduction. I searched the 'open' and 
'closed' bug reports, and I don't see this listed.
Thanks.  This was in trunk but not 2.2.  It should get in the next release.
creator: slive@apache.org
